name: Easy Pricing
author: Nick Theodoulou

sections.description:
Easy Pricing allows you to create and manage pricing plans for your business with a simple and intuitive interface. Whether you’re offering subscriptions, memberships, or one-time purchases, Easy Pricing can help you display your options attractively.

Features include:

  • Easy-to-use admin interface to add and edit pricing plans
  • Shortcode integration for easy insertion into pages or posts
  • Responsive design for mobile and desktop views
  • Customizable titles, prices, and descriptions for each plan
  • Bullet points for highlighting key features of plans
  • Redirect URL configuration for seamless purchase process
  • Contact form integration to connect with potential customers

Usage

To add a pricing table to your page:

  1. Create a new page in WordPress.
  2. Add the shortcode [easy_pricing] to your page content.
  3. Go to the ‘Easy Pricing’ tab in your WordPress admin to configure your pricing plans and settings.
  4. Save your changes and view the page to see your new pricing table.

Arbitrary section

The Easy Pricing plugin is easy to extend and customize to fit the look and feel of your website. If you have any questions or need support, please visit our support page.

Additional Notes

The options page code structure uses the Carbon Fields library to create a user-friendly interface for the admin settings.
sections.installation:
1. Download the easy-pricing.zip file from the WordPress plugins directory.
  2. Navigate to the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Click on ‘Add New’ and select the ‘Upload Plugin’ button at the top of the page.
  4. Upload the easy-pricing.zip file and click ‘Install Now’.
  5. After installation, activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
How can I customize the pricing plans?

You can customize your pricing plans through the ‘Easy Pricing’ options page in the WordPress admin. Add titles, prices, descriptions, bullet points, and more.

Is the plugin responsive?

Yes, Easy Pricing is designed to look great on both desktop and mobile devices.
